originalText.text: There are not enough words to describe how incredible my time was aboard the MIS Moondance! I celebrated my 21st birthday cruising along the Hudson and East Rivers, watching the sunset and partying with close friends and family. The yacht was spectacular, the views were beautiful, the catered food was delicious and the crew on board did an excellent job of making sure everything ran perfectly! There is no doubt that this was an experience everyone on board will continue talking about for years to come!

originalText.text:
I would be remiss not to take the time to write a review about Aahoy Yacht Charters. In early May, six of my good friends and myself chartered a yacht from NYC to Annapolis, MD. The trip took 2.5 days in total with 12-hour stop in Atlantic City to do some entertaining. The booking process was seamless, the pricing was better than any charter company I tried working with and the experience was amazing! Thanks everyone from Aahoy Yacht Charters for this incredible experience and your attention to detail.
-Dr. James Reid

text.text:

originalText.text: My wife and I had our 25th wedding anniversary on the Hudson with 75 of our closest friends and family. The sunset cruise was more than we could have ever imagined! The evening was spectacular and the crew, the captain and the hostess made us feel like family. Thank you everyone for such a great experience. We will cherish these times for the rest of our lives!

text.text: My wife and I had our 25th wedding anniversary on the Hudson with 75 of our closest friends and family. The sunset cruise was more than we could have ever imagined! The evening was spectacular and the crew, the captain and the hostess made us feel like family. Thank you everyone for such a great experience. We will cherish these times for the rest of our lives!

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of taking a tour from Atlantic highlands to the Statue of lLiberty with a few business associates last week. The weather, the crew and the boat were all amazing! The catering was unbelievable and the whole process was so smooth my business associate is using the same service to book his family outing for fourth of July fireworks. Thanks to the team from Aahoy Yacht Charters for everything. Soup to nuts they are hands down the best charter service I've worked with.

originalText.text:
I have been on a trip up to the Hudson River with all my best friend on a Sunday on Mis Moondance.

It has been a day of freedom and joy I will remember for ever.

I am happy I’ve done such a wonderful experience with the ones I love and with the awesome crew on the boat that has transformed our day in a memorable experience.
Thank you All
